about_the_game:
DEMO NOW AVAILABLE.

Play the Reticent Retribution Demo for free.
Windows and Linux support.

Buy the game Reticent Retribution for $1 and receive an easy mode cheat code build!
Try my product?

gamer1: "Of course I tried the game, it is free software."

gamer3: "It is fun to play."

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz × 2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Processor Integrated 720p 60fps
  • Storage: 14 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz × 2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Processor Integrated 720p 60fps
  • Storage: 14 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated
